apihelp-teamcommentblock-description: The commentblock API allows blocking a user from the comment it originated from after filling out the following parameters: CommentID.
apihelp-teamcommentblock-summary: The commentblock API allows blocking a user from the comment it originated from after filling out the following parameters: CommentID.
apihelp-teamcommentdelete-description: The commentdelete API allows deleting a comment after filling out the following parameters: CommentID.
apihelp-teamcommentdelete-summary: The commentdelete API allows deleting a comment after filling out the following parameters: CommentID.
apihelp-teamcommentlatestid-description: The commentlatestID API allows to retrieve latest comment ID after filling out the following parameters: pageID
apihelp-teamcommentlatestid-summary: The commentlatestID API allows to retrieve latest comment ID after filling out the following parameters: pageID
apihelp-teamcommentlist-description: The commentlist API retrieves multiple comments and outputs them as a list after filling out the following parameters: pageID, order, pagerPage, and showForm.
apihelp-teamcommentlist-summary: The commentlist API retrieves multiple comments and outputs them as a list after filling out the following parameters: pageID, order, pagerPage, and showForm.
apihelp-teamcommentsubmit-description: The commentsubmit API allows to submit/post a comment after filling out the following parameters: pageID, parentID, commentText.
apihelp-teamcommentsubmit-summary: The commentsubmit API allows to submit/post a comment after filling out the following parameters: pageID, parentID, commentText.
apihelp-teamcommentvote-description: The commentvote API allows to vote on a comment after filling out the following parameters: commentID, voteValue.
apihelp-teamcommentvote-summary: The commentvote API allows to vote on a comment after filling out the following parameters: commentID, voteValue.
apihelp-teamcommentblock-param-teamcomme: Comment ID of the comment by user which is to be blocked
apihelp-teamcommentdelete-param-teamcomm: Comment ID of the comment to be deleted
apihelp-teamcommentlatestid-param-pageID: Page ID of the page on which latest comment is there
apihelp-teamcommentlist-param-pageID: Page ID of the page from which comment list is retrieved
apihelp-teamcommentlist-param-order: Defined whether comment list in ascending or descending order
apihelp-teamcommentsubmit-param-pageID: Page ID of the page on which comment is to be submitted
apihelp-teamcommentsubmit-param-parentID: Comment ID of the parent comment
apihelp-teamcommentvote-param-teamcommen: Comment ID of the comment that is voted for
teamcomments-desc: Adds <comments> parser hook that allows commenting on pages
teamcomments-db-locked:
Adding comments

The database is currently locked for routine database maintenance, after which it will be back to normal. Please check back later!
teamcomments-block-warning-anon: Are you sure you want to permanently ignore all comments from this anonymous user (via their IP address)?
teamcomments-block-warning-user: Are you sure you want to permanently ignore all comments from user $1?
teamcomments-delete-warning: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
teamcomments-ignore-message: You are ignoring the author of this comment
teamcomments-login-required: You must be logged in to add comments
teamcomments-not-allowed: You are not allowed to post comments.
teamcomments-anon-message: {{SITENAME}} welcomes all comments. If you do not want to be anonymous, register or log in. It is free.
teamcomments-links-are-forbidden: External links in comments are forbidden!
teamcomments-is-spam: Submitted text of the comment was interpreted as spam.
teamcomments-ignore-no-users: There are no users currently blocked.
teamcomments-ignore-remove-message: Are you sure you want to unblock user $1's comments?
log-description-teamcomments: This is a log of comments.
